Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Tzar is a fantasy-medieval real-time strategy game with a touch of RPG. You play one of three  Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ distinct races, European, Asian or Arabian. Your civilization and your economy will depend on  Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ your ability to harvest four different resources, master two different trade methods and       Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ defend our kingdom with powerful and unique warriors.                                          Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ                                                                                                Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Expect to conquer territory fighting with - or against - Ninjas and Samurais, Stone Golems,    Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Ogres and Dwarven Axe throwers, flying units like Dragons, Flying Carpets and Bats as well     Ãƒâ€˜Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
